title: Weekly Digest (19 April, 2020 - 26 April, 2020)
body:
Here's the **Weekly Digest** for [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react):

 - - - 
# ISSUES
Last week 69 issues were created.
Of these, 28 issues have been closed and 41 issues are still open.
## OPEN ISSUES
:green_heart: #10434 [Account is freezing with endless spinner if tap on account from list  during sign in when autologin is enabled](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10434), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10432 [Can't open watch-only account inside keycard multiaccount due to missing address field](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10432), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10431 [Pending transactions are not shown in wallet (keycard accounts only)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10431), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10430 [[keycard] [e2e test menu] Use regular multiacc for kk simulation ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10430), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #10429 [Margin issue in public chat input field](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10429), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #10428 [After 1 launch of application when error is appeared during creating flow (i.e. wrong card) "Okay" button is unaccessible](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10428), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10427 [First carrousel image onboarding is cut off](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10427), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #10426 [Truncate Chat key display in Profile in middle](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10426), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #10425 [Blank Chats view if quickly tap twice "<" back button from any chat view  ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10425), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #10424 ["Offline, waiting for WiFi" chat status when Mobile network connected is misleading](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10424), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #10423 ["cannot locate account for address: [wallet address]" error when sending TX](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10423), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #10422 [Show ENS name only when confirmed](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10422), by [jrainville](https://github.com/jrainville)
:green_heart: #10421 [[#10385] [perfromance][chat] Optimize input field in chat](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10421), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #10419 [WIP Add animated headers to profiles](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10419), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:green_heart: #10418 [Can login to account just via tap upon it from `Your keys` view](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10418), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #10417 [Redefine technical specs for image sending](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10417), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #10416 [Research desktop build process](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10416), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:green_heart: #10414 [Implement support for latest version of eip-1193](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10414), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #10413 [fix: display the value to sign as a bytes32 hex string if the data is 66 chars long](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10413), by [richard-ramos](https://github.com/richard-ramos)
:green_heart: #10411 [Try to make desktop work by commenting out packages etc.](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10411), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:green_heart: #10404 [Message marked as sent but it's not (when bad network connection)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10404), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #10398 [User is navigated to "Your keys have been successfully recovered" screen instead of accounts list if tap on "Back" after unlock existing account](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10398), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10395 [Research and spec personal nodes](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10395), by [StatusSceptre](https://github.com/StatusSceptre)
:green_heart: #10394 [fix: add debounce to "Done" button in the recipient selection dialog](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10394), by [richard-ramos](https://github.com/richard-ramos)
:green_heart: #10393 [fix: change amount-input field keyboard type and autocapitalization to display decimal separator](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10393), by [richard-ramos](https://github.com/richard-ramos)
:green_heart: #10392 ["Sync using mobile data?" bottom sheet is overlapped with keyboard if app is in foreground](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10392), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10391 [fix: prevent multiple taps on Register button from opening several tx during ENS registration](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10391), by [michaelsbradleyjr](https://github.com/michaelsbradleyjr)
:green_heart: #10388 [fix(signing/views): allow discarding signing popup when tx in progress](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10388), by [PascalPrecht](https://github.com/PascalPrecht)
:green_heart: #10386 [[perfromance][chat] Optimize chat view](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10386), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #10385 [[perfromance][chat] Optimize input field in chat](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10385), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #10384 [Protocol specs](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10384), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #10383 [[perfromance] Performance EPIC](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10383), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #10382 [[perfromance][contact] Optimize navigation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10382), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #10381 [[perfromance][contact] Optimize contacts subscriptions](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10381), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #10380 [[perfromance][chat] Remove all subscriptions from list items](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10380), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #10379 [[perfromance][chat] Optimize chat subscriptions](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10379), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #10377 [[perfromance] Improve sign in flow](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10377), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #10375 [Can't install Status on real android device using make command](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10375), by [PascalPrecht](https://github.com/PascalPrecht)
:green_heart: #10373 [Add collectibles support to Status wallet ü¶ã](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10373), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #10372 [feat: persistent send/receive action at bottom of asset list](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10372), by [michaelsbradleyjr](https://github.com/michaelsbradleyjr)
:green_heart: #10365 [fix: connectivity banner height](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10365), by [emizzle](https://github.com/emizzle)
## CLOSED ISSUES
:heart: #10433 [Android build crashes after launch with Java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10433), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)

:heart: #10406 [[#10396] Quoted text (using markdown) in dark mode is hardly visible](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10406), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)

:heart: #10400 [start loading messages earlier](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10400), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #10397 [upgrade fastlane and plugins](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10397), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #10396 [Quoted text (using markdown) in dark mode  is hardly visible](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10396), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #10390 [New invite to group chat will be not sent if user left chat and then will be readded](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10390), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #10389 [Sometimes messages-replies don't change state to "Sent" (endless spinner)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10389), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #10387 [gradle: upgrade plugin to 3.6.0](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10387), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #10378 [[perfromance] Investigate reagent tick](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10378), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #10376 [makefile: add missing TARGET for android-clean](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10376), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #10374 [Fix replies messages](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10374), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)

:heart: #10370 [[#10369] App freezes on transaction signing after entering wrong pass‚Ä¶](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10370), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #10369 [App freezes on transaction signing after entering wrong password](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10369), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)

:heart: #10367 [ re-frisk 1.0](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10367), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #10366 [App Dark mode: signing phrase+message not visible when Signing message in Dapps](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10366), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
## LIKED ISSUE
:+1: #10365 [fix: connectivity banner height](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10365), by [emizzle](https://github.com/emizzle)
It received :+1: x2, :smile: x0, :tada: x0 and :heart: x1.
## NOISY ISSUE
:speaker: #10373 [Add collectibles support to Status wallet ü¶ã](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10373), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
It received 19 comments.

 - - - 
# PULL REQUESTS
Last week, 49 pull requests were created, updated or merged.
## UPDATED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 27 pull requests were updated.

 - - - 
# COMMITS
Last week there were 29 commits.
:hammer_and_wrench: [undo removing of preBuild gradle stop  This partially reverts commit 548fe04f54fe6d6b572dd8ecbbf6de88227f68d1.  Signed-off-by: Jakub Soko≈Çowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/439643daa4ed9f1d8ee0662141d73818ea474a55) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix(wallet/accounts): don't store derived account when it exists in app db  As discussed in #10326 and later in https://github.com/status-im/status-go/issues/1939, it turns out that, when a user tries to add an account (from a seed phrase), while an account with the same address (that the seed phrase would result in) exists in the application state, the application would still go ahead and store the derived account in status-go.  After that it still reports to the user that the 'Account already exits'.  This commit ensures that Status doesn't try to store the derived account when the account already exists in the application database.  Fixes #10326  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/3fce0022130dd184c348cb7b0e3d4733ebdcf955) by [PascalPrecht](https://github.com/PascalPrecht)
:hammer_and_wrench: [nix: upgrade 2.3.2 > 2.3.4  Signed-off-by: Jakub Soko≈Çowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/e1eda363e6253f8806f0e4ee99e1251914b9323e) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [nix: refactor android sdk package  Signed-off-by: Jakub Soko≈Çowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/68b9b18cae57d5880bc00c06a6b06baba5c0e671) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [gradle: remove unused buck configuration  Signed-off-by: Jakub Soko≈Çowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/548fe04f54fe6d6b572dd8ecbbf6de88227f68d1) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)

:hammer_and_wrench: [Handle when message confirmations arrive out of order.  In some cases message confirmations might arrive out of order, before status-go calls the callback for a sent message.
